about_the_game:
Ice Cold Case - Detective RPG

An indie project inspired by titans such as Fallout: New Vegas and Disco Elysium.

The city of Bayview’s sleepy italian district has been rocked by a murder. Can you uncover the truth behind the crime and restore calm ?

Features 


  • Discover a meticulously crafted neighbourhood in a 3D voxel style.
  • Inquire, gather evidence and testimony from the citizens, and confront suspects in rich dialogue
  • Be your own kind of detective by choosing the skills that help you interact in the world and in conversations
  • Dive into life in the city of Bayview, its art, culture, history, and politics.
  • A wide variety of characters, including detailled digital-painted portraits for specific NPCs
  • Enjoy this pocket-sized (and pocket priced!) detective RPG inspired by the genre's greatest
